tokenError.401: Your link has a problem - please contact Chalkboard Education for support.
tokenError.402: Your token is in use on another device. Kindly contact Chalkboard Education if you believe this is an error.

update.label: Update
update.upToDate: Your app is already up to date!
update.errorWhileCheckingUpdates: There is a network problem while checking updates.
update.errorWhileUpdating: There is a network problem while updating.
update.stayOnline: Please stay online when downloading updates

validation.success: Thank you. Your progress is saved.

sms.title: Submit your validation by SMS
sms.label: You will send a code by SMS. Do not modify the code, thank you.

login.title: Login
login.hint: Your 6-character token can be found appended to the login URL sent to you via SMS. For example: https://chalkedu.co/#/login/token. Alternatively, you may use the login link sent to you via SMS to log back in.

logout.title: Confirm Logout
logout.message: Are you sure you want to logout?
